author: mempirate
content: Does anyone know where I can find some SSZ encoded mainnet blocks for test purposes?

author: marioevz
content: If you only want to test the format, you could use https://simpleserialize.com/ which supports up to capella

author: jgm
content: You can use https://github.com/wealdtech/ethdo to fetch them, e.g. `ethdo block info --ssz`
